# Contact

## Reporting bugs

For discussions we also try to follow these channels:

* [CrossValidated](https://stats.StackExchange.com/questions/tagged/zero-inflation) with `zero-inflation` or `negative-binomial` tag
* [R-help](https://stat.ethz.ch/mailman/listinfo/R-help) mailing list
